line.originaltext: 2 teaspoons olive oil
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves")

line.originaltext: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated large crescent roll dough
line.annotation: create_ing(ing2, "1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated large crescent roll dough")

line.originaltext: 8 ounces Brie cheese
1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and stems removed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and stems removed")

line.originaltext: 4 (1/2 ounce) slices prosciutto
Heat oil in a heavy skillet; or spray a nonstick frying pan with cooking spray.
Heat oil in a heavy skillet; or spray a nonstick frying pan with cooking spray.
Saute chicken breasts until no longer pink, and juices run clear; set aside.
Saute chicken breasts until no longer pink, and juices run clear; set aside.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.)
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.)
Unroll 4 large crescent rolls.
Layer each with 3 thin slices brie, 3 leaves spinach and 1 slice prosciutto.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing8, "dough with stuff", "layer 3 slices brie, 3 leaves spinach, 1 slice prosciutto")

line.originaltext: Place chicken breast in the center of dough.
line.annotation: combine({ing7, ing8}, ing9, "bundled chicken", "put in center of dough")

line.originaltext: Wrap and tuck dough around chicken until completely enclosed.
line.annotation: do(ing9, , ing12, "chicken in dough", "wrap and tuck dough around chicken")

line.originaltext: Place seam side down on baking sheet.
Place seam side down on baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing12, t1, ing10, "baked chicken bundles", "for 10 to 15 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
